About Me

A few things to know about me...

Bio

Developer with 6+ years coding experience, passionately learning and helping clients leverage new technologies and industry standards. Experienced in Mobile Web Dev, Business Process Modelling, Asset Management, Technical Documentation, and multiple ERP, CRM and CMS platforms.

The Past

Summarized origin story

Born in Lagos Nigeria, grew up toying with computers since the windows '95 days, wanting to work with them for the rest of my life. studied the sciences, and graduated with a degree in computer engineering from the University of Benin, freelancing all the way.

The Present

What I'm up to these days

RF Engineer and Software Analyst at Livia Soft, reviewing, deploying and developing technical documentation for enterprise applications. By moonlight, I do freelance webdev and practice programming almost daily.

The Future

Goals, hopes & dreams etcetera

Looking to master the latest technologies ( , firebase, electron, flutter/dart etc). Collaborate globally in a career with a reputable tech agency. Take care of loved ones. Help the poor. Settle down. Contribute to humanity. Leave a legacy.

Overview

Bankole Esan

Tech Summary

Code: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript ES6, VueJS, Firebase, PHP, MySQL, jQuery, Python, Django, Wordpress, Zurb Foundation, Materialize CSS, Bootstrap 4, Sass, Git, NodeJS, Express, NPM, MongoDB

Tools: Windows, Linux (Ubuntu), Terminal, VSCode, Vim, nano, Catalog StyleGuide, StopLight Studio, Swagger, PHPMyAdmin, MySQL Workbench, Postman, Github, Netlify, Heroku, LeanTime, Adobe (XD, Illustrator, Photoshop, After-effects, Acrobat Professional), Gravit Designer, MS Office, Libre Office, GLPI, Bonitasoft, SuiteCRM, EspoCRM, Kanboard, OpenMaint, Together Workflow, OpenDocMan, RedMine, Moodle, FL Studio, MediaWiki, webtrees.
